Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve in Orlando (SeaWorld - Convention Center), you'll be close to Faldo Golf Institute and SeaWorld® Orlando. This family-friendly condominium resort is within close proximity of Aquatica and Discovery Cove.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 86 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Practice your swing on the golf course and enjoy other recreational amenities, such as an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. This condominium resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Orlando? This condominium resort has facilities measuring 1368 square feet (127 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve in Orlando (SeaWorld - Convention Center), you'll be close to Faldo Golf Institute and SeaWorld® Orlando. This family-friendly condominium resort is within close proximity of Aquatica and Discovery Cove.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Faldo Golf Institute - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Aquatica - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Discovery Cove - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
SeaWorld® Orlando - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Orlando Kart Center - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Hunters Creek Golf Club - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Orange County Convention Center - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Pointe Orlando - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Dr. P. Phillips Hospital - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Wonderworks - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Florida Mall - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Pirate's Cove Adventure Golf - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Tupperware Center - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
I-Drive 360 - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Orlando Eye - 6.5 km / 4 mi

The preferred airport for Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
